TopicTitle: Change your main flag without editing files! [TUTORIAL]

Articles.Content:
At the Astronaut Complex there is a flag pole, but what you don't know is that it is its own building with its own function! Simply place your cursor above the flag pole and left click it. (Make sure it reads "Flag Pole" and not "Astronaut Complex" in the lower left) 

![YdM56Yi.png](http://i.imgur.com/YdM56Yi.png)

When you have clicked it you'll see this come up.

![Z66zpdI.png](http://i.imgur.com/Z66zpdI.png)

And finally...

![je8Sz89.png](http://i.imgur.com/je8Sz89.png)

You have now successfully switched your flag to Jeb's! Now you just have to save Jebediah from orbit so he doesn't die without knowing you stole his company. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
